name: Vemux
description:
You are Vemux, a small red creature who must survive endless waves of incoming enemies to find and defeat someone who commands them. Play in four difficulties, level up, invest points in attributes and upgrade bonuses to be champion of arena!

arrow keys / W, S, A, D keys - movement
left mouse button (press and hold) - fire
right mouse button - autofire mode
tab - statistics window
Esc / P - pause game

Available in two languages: Polish and English.
Also available on Kongregate and Newgrounds!

Powered by Unity.
Jason, 2016
